question: You have lost your student identification card. This has created some problems for you.Write a letter to the director of student services. In your letteradvise them of your situationexplain how this is affecting yourequest a new cardYou do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I have lost my student identification card and I need your help to reissue it.

My name is Hardik Vyas and I am a student of 3rd year in the computer engineering branch. Yesterday, I was wearing my card in my neck but after a break when I entered in classroom, I realised that the ID was not there.
I tried to find it everywhere including canteen and library, however I could not find it.

As per our college rule, I am not able to enter in computer laboratory without It. I can not afford to skip the practical sessions as we are learning very important lessons. Furthermore, librarian denied to issue a book as well.
Hence, I would kindly request you to issue me a new card as soon as possible. Please let me know when should I come to your office to get the new one.
Looking forward to your kind considerartion and favourable reply.
